Procedure Summary
::::GetActiveCLIPort { {portIdString 1} }

################################################################# Procedure Name: GetActiveCLIPort Description: This function converts the specified list of portIds to to the active cli ports Input args: {portIdString} Output args: none Return value: integer or : separated list of integers Typical usage: SendACmd "config vlan1 add port [GetActiveCLIPort 3-5,7]" Category: Utility #################################################################

::::GetCLIPort { {portIdString 1} {active active} }

################################################################# Procedure Name: GetCLIPort Description: This function converts the specified list of portIds to to the list of corresponding DUT port numbers.
